posts.post_content: The idea behind this card is that it sets your opponent back one(-) by exiling one of their creatures; afterward, assuming all goes well, it sets you ahead(+) by allowing you to copy a token. If you play this correctly, and that's probably not going to happen unless your deck is designed for Populating/token-generation, this could be a powerhouse.
posts.html:
The idea behind this card is that it sets your opponent back one(-) by exiling one of their creatures; afterward, assuming all goes well, it sets you ahead(+) by allowing you to copy a token. If you play this correctly, and that's probably not going to happen unless your deck is designed for Populating/token-generation, this could be a powerhouse.

posts.post_content:
This definitely saved my bacon in the prerelease. Yes, 6 mana is a lot, but I usually had a centaur token around, and you know what? A flash [nekrataal](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=nekrataal) is pretty good!  
  
From what I felt, the format was slow enough to make this a really solid card.  
  
Outside ravnica, go look for [Spitting image](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Spitting image) and its elk :).

posts.post_content: Six mana is a bargain for this effect in limited; exiling their biggest threat and, more often than not, getting yourself a token is a huge swing. Not to mention that the token is usually a 3/3.
posts.html:
Six mana is a bargain for this effect in limited; exiling their biggest threat and, more often than not, getting yourself a token is a huge swing. Not to mention that the token is usually a 3/3.
Report Abuse  
Posted By: Alsalceion (9/29/2012 7:43:48 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I agree that this will never see the light of day in constructed, but in limited people vastly underrate this card. Exiling is HUGE in Ravnica with all the Scavenge running around (and a couple creatures have "die" effects, I think; I know there's one bird that draws you a card when it dies) and populate is, potentially, an insanely good mechanic. This sucker one me games by eliminating a huge threat and populating out that one extra flying 1/1 bird or 3/3 centaur or once, notably, 4/4 rhino. Again, jank in constructed; but in limited, if you're playing Selesnya, this is an absolute bomb.
posts.html:
